view.screens

Interface DynamicView


  • public interface DynamicView
    It contains methods that add update functionalities to a generic scene.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pauseScene(Notifications notification)
      This method stops every moving element in the scene and shows a menu.
      void playScene()
      This method restores the normal behavior of the scene after a pause.
      void updateScene(java.util.List<ControlCommunication> entities)
      This method updates the scene using informations contained in entities' list.

    • Method Detail

      • updateScene

        void updateScene(java.util.List<ControlCommunication> entities)
        This method updates the scene using informations contained in entities' list.
        Parameters:
        entities - List of entities to be drawn or updated with their informations
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If called before scene initialization

      • pauseScene

        void pauseScene(Notifications notification)
        This method stops every moving element in the scene and shows a menu.
        Parameters:
        notification - The pause reason
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If called before initialization or first update

      • playScene

        void playScene()
        This method restores the normal behavior of the scene after a pause.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If called before initialization or first update
